title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body:
I've encountered this problem before, and solved it by deleting my League of Legends completely and transferring files from my friend's computer using a USB stick. Before I'm branded as absolutely retarded, I just want to say that I have searched up fixes and solutions on the web, and also employed the help of said friend for a couple hours only to find no leads as to why the Patcher Kernel isn't working.  

In the League of Legends folder, there are: RADS, lol.launcher.admin, and lol.launcher . 
In the RADS folder, there is: projects, solutions(empty), system, temp, rads_user_kernel, and several logs under the same name
(i.e rads_user_kernel.log1, 2, etc)

EDIT: Yes, I have tried running as admin, ticked admin box for patcher, and have ran in compatibility mode.

replies.body:
Hey Bendoesntsuck,

Sometimes, transferring files from one computer to another may cause problems. Can you try running a clean re-install of League of Legends and let me know whether it works once you've done that?
